    @Repository
public class BuildFilterJdbcRepository
extends AbstractJdbcRepository
implements BuildFilterRepository
     BUILD_FILTERS --
 ACCOUNTID INTEGER      NOT NULL
 BRANCHID  INTEGER      NOT NULL
 NAME      VARCHAR(120) NOT NULL
 TYPE      VARCHAR(150) NOT NULL
 DATA      TEXT         NOT NULL

      • delete

        public Ack delete(int accountId,
                  int branchId,
                  java.lang.String name,
                  boolean shared)
        Description copied from interface: BuildFilterRepository
        Deletes a filter from a branch and for an account. If shared is true, we have also to delete it from the shared filters.
        Specified by:
        delete in interface BuildFilterRepository
        Parameters:
        accountId - Account to delete the filter from
        branchId - Branch to delete the filter from
        name - Name of the filter to delete
        shared - If set, deletes the filter from the shared ones as well
        Returns:
        If a filter was deleted
